2133.subject: NURS
2133.descrlong: This course is to facilitate your understanding of the history, politics, and process of health and social policy  making in the US and to develop policy analysis and writing skills.  We will explore various social, political, and multiple cultural factors that affect policy making and discuss how and why the process of policy analysis and decision making has constructed health and social systems in the United States. There is a semester-long, team-based policy analysis project.
